<a id="HFlowContainer"></a>

# HFlowContainer

**Inherits:** [FlowContainer](FlowContainer.md) **\<** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A container that arranges its child controls horizontally and wraps them around at the borders.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A variant of [FlowContainer](FlowContainer.md) that can only arrange its child controls horizontally, wrapping them around at the borders. This is similar to how text in a book wraps around when no more words can fit on a line.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->
